name: Zip-Fox Rush
description:
Zip-Fox Rush

Help these 2 soul-bound foxes to avoid angry wood logs!

The soul that's binding them will make them "zip" together, which makes them unseparable. Hold / release the 'W' button to force "unzip" / "zip" them while moving them left and right.

Controls 

Left arrow : move left

Right arrow : move right

'W' key press : unzip

'W' key release : zip

For a smoother playing experience, you can download either the Linux / Windows distribution (depending on your operating system) of this game which are available for download
